Title: Elmah2 : An extensable error logger for ASP.net
Description:
A project inspired by elmah (http://code.google.com/p/elmah/)
The primary goals of this project are
  -> A plugin style architecture for logging modules
  -> A very lightweight logging module
  -> Support for multiple web apps
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A project inspired by elmah
The primary goals of this project are
  • A plugin style architecture for logging modules
  • A very lightweight logging module
  • Support for multiple web apps

Project News
  • 12/31/2010 - This project is not dead, I've just been unable to think of anything to add! Please post suggestions in the discussions
  • 6/15/2010 - Beta One has been released
  • 6/15/2010 - Created some documentation on how to install and configure the logger and related modules

Known Issues
  • If a new application is added, the web ui will not recognize it until the app reloaded

Libraries Used or Adopted
Elmah
jQuery
Flexigrid
Npgsql
MySql .netconnector
